messageBody:
bart spedden wrote:
>
>
> Does anyone know how to set the Max Memory Heap size for ant? I was
> thinking that something like this might work:
>
> ant -Dmx=128 build

-D sets JVM properties, and so it doesn't do what you think it's doing.
The java switch is -Xmx128m, so you need the equivalent switch in Ant
for "pass options through to the compiler".

Since Ant does more than compile Java code, you likely need to use the
heap size setting in each Ant target that runs Java code, rather than
doing it once for your buildfile.
